ygData.subject: Re: Shauri's and Crisson's (was: Re: Re: BARD HATE)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... This raises an interesting possibility - that this broken-ness is in fact a level dependency and not a new bug. I still consider that to be broken
ygData.messageBody:
On Sun, 24 Oct 1999, Benjamin Jerrad Segal wrote:
>
> Upon attaining my 28th song, I decided to join the ranks of testers and
> attempted to mez myself between pulls/spawns in Cazic-Thule/Highkeep. I
> only ever managed two of the results, complete resist or successful stun
> (i.e. no "icon up but movement possible"). I did notice one oddity.

This raises an interesting possibility - that this
"broken-ness" is in fact a level dependency and not a new bug.
I still consider that to be broken though, since we don't get
upgrades to our songs.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
